posts.title: Satya Nadella dumps 50% of Microsoft shares in multiple tranches ahead of capital gains tax change
posts.desc: The Microsoft CEO offloaded about 840,000 shares for over $285 million, according to a filing with the US Securities and Exchange Commission.

posts.title: Gold price today: 10 grams of 24-carat gold touches Rs 48,110; silver trading at Rs 61,700 per kg
posts.desc: Gold futures fell 0.06 percent to Rs 47,775.00 and silver futures rose by 0.08 percent to Rs 62,337.00, according to recent trends in Multi Commodity Exchange data

posts.title: Petrol, diesel prices today: Rates unchanged on 01 December, check here what you need to pay in your city
posts.desc: Petrol and diesel prices on 01 December 2021: Petrol price in Delhi stands at Rs 103.97 per litre while diesel is available for Rs 86.67. In Mumbai, petrol is retailing at Rs 109.98 while diesel costs Rs 94.14

posts.title: Ola launches 10-minute grocery delivery in Mumbai and Bangalore, hits 1,000 orders a day
posts.desc: More recently, Zomato, which entered the segment before its initial public offering, shut it within months although it has a strategic stake in Grofers

posts.title: Tega Industries IPO: Subscription to open from tomorrow; find all details here
posts.desc: The Kolkata-based company’s shares will be listed on the NSE and the BSE on 13 December

posts.title: Centre to introduce new bill on cryptocurrency in Parliament after Cabinet approval, says Nirmala Sitharaman
posts.desc: The finance minister in Rajya Sabha said the government, RBI and Sebi have been cautioning people about cryptocurrencies being a ‘high risk’ area and ‘more can be done’ to create awareness

posts.title: Sundar Pichai to Indra Nooyi: Twitter's Parag Agrawal becomes latest Indian to head global multinationals
posts.desc: Twitter's outgoing CEO Jack Dorsey announced that 37-year old Parag Agrawal, an IIT Mumbai and Stanford University alumnus, will be the company's new chief executive as he stepped down after 16 years at the company that he co-founded and helmed

posts.title: Gold price today: 10 grams of 24-carat gold sold at Rs 48,310, silver reaches Rs 62,000 per kg
posts.desc: As per the Multi Commodity Exchange data, the value of gold futures rose by 0.05 percent to Rs 47,982 while silver futures witnessed a fall of 0.81 percent, which currently stands at Rs 62.455

posts.title: Omicron COVID-19 variant raises new fears for pandemic-hit world economy
posts.desc: In the worst-case scenario, 2022 growth could fall to around 2.3 percent, as compared to the 4.5 percent expected by Oxford Economics before the variant emerged.

posts.title: Don’t ban cryptocurrencies, instead set up a regulatory body
posts.desc: The potential of crypto is enormous and banning it would be throwing the baby out with the bathwater

posts.title: Petrol, diesel prices today: Rates constant on 30 November, check here what you need to pay in your city
posts.desc: Petrol and diesel prices on 30 November 2021: Petrol price in Delhi stands at Rs 103.97 per litre while diesel is available for Rs 86.67. In Mumbai, petrol is retailing at Rs 109.98 while diesel costs Rs 94.14

posts.title: Meet Parag Agrawal: Indian-origin executive succeeds Jack Dorsey as Twitter CEO
posts.desc: Agrawal said in a note posted on Twitter that he is honoured and humbled on his appointment and expressed gratitude to Dorsey’s “continued mentorship and your friendship

posts.title: Reserve Bank of India imposes Rs 1 crore penalty on Union Bank of India
posts.desc: Last week, RBI imposed a monetary penalty of Rs 1 crore on the State Bank of India (SBI) for contravention of a provision in the Banking Regulation (BR) Act, 1949

posts.title: Twitter CEO Jack Dorsey steps down; social media company names CTO Parag Agrawal as replacement
posts.desc: Dorsey is also the top executive at Square, a financial payments company that he founded, and some big investors have openly questioned whether he can be effective leading both

posts.title: Star Health IPO opens tomorrow: All you need to about price band, fresh issue and other details
posts.desc: With this IPO, Star Health is aiming to raise Rs 7,249.18 crore. The IPO consists of fresh issue of equity shares worth Rs 2,000 crore and an offer-for-sale (OFS) of up to 58,324,225 equity shares by promoters and shareholders

posts.title: Market Roundup: Sensex rises by 153 points, Nifty ends at 17,053; check top winners and losers here
posts.desc: India VIX closed at 20.83 points. BSE Midcap fell by 0.93 percent to 24,615.79 while BSE Smallcap fell by 1.93 percent to 27,538.93

posts.title: Sovereign Gold Bond Scheme opens today; here's all you need to know about price, discounts and where to buy
posts.desc: This scheme was launched in 2015 with an intention of reducing the demand for physical gold and shifting a part of domestic savings (used for buying gold) into financial savings

posts.title: Rupee sees high volatility as worries resurfaced around new COVID strain
posts.desc: The dollar index rose by 0.19 percent to 96.27 and the global oil benchmark Brent crude futures advanced 4.06 percent to USD 75.67 per barrel

posts.title: Market update: Sensex, Nifty begin volatile trading session; check details here
posts.desc: After initial losses, BSE Sensex rose by 0.41 percent or 233.25 points to 57,340.40, while NSE Nifty 50 opened at 17,055.80 and rose by 0.08 percent, gaining 12.90 points to 17,039.35

posts.title: Gold price today: 10 grams of 24-carat gold at Rs 48,320; silver touches Rs 62,000 per kg
posts.desc: According to updated Multi Commodity Exchange data, the value of gold futures rose by 0.36 percent to Rs 48,134 while silver futures witnessed a rise of 1.05 percent, which stood at Rs 63,624
